productHero.infoText: Use special packages that will allow you to quickly localize.

article_1.title: Easy to use
article_1.text: Everything is simple and without unnecessary decisions. The user-friendly interface will ensure intuitive use of the application.

article_2.title: NEW EXPERIENCES
article_2.text: Discover new possibilities for fast and convenient localization. Everything is done so that nothing distracts you from the translation.

article_3.title: Free access
article_3.text: Everything you need is already at the start. No need to pay for regular use of the starter pack.

productHowItWorks.title: How it works
text: We create a project, if necessary, we add co-localizers
Add a file from the suggested formats and localize it.

productCTA.title: leave feedback
productCTA.subText: Always be in touch with us.

contentRow.notTranslate: I don't know how translate this text.

error404.title: 404: The page you are looking for isn’t here
error404.help: You either tried some shady route or you came here by mistake.Whichever it is, try using the navigation

about.video: Your browser does not support the video tag.

createProject.title: Create Project
createProject.text_1: To start working in the Localiz application, you need to create a project. To do this, open the Projects page, which is located on the task panel under the name 'Projects'.
createProject.text_2: After that, you need to click the 'Create Project' button.
createProject.text_3: Enter the information about the project you want to localize.
createProject.li_1: In the 'From' field, enter the language you want to localize.
createProject.li_2: In the 'To' field, enter the language you want to localize to.
createProject.alert: Please fill in these fields carefully, as they will be used for providing hints! Without them, they will not work!

documentManagement.title: Document Management
documentManagement.text_1: On the project page, you can directly add and delete documents. You can also search for specific documents. By clicking on a particular document, you will go to the localization page.

localization.title: Localization
localization.text_1: The localization page contains tables with fields for localization. The 'DEFAULT' column contains the text string that needs to be localized.
localization.text_2: The next field is for entering the translation of the text. If you are satisfied with the translation, save it by clicking on the save icon, which is located right after the translation field.
localization.text_3: At the beginning, there is a button that opens additional information about this string.
localization.li_1: The 'Get Document' button returns the localized document.
localization.li_2: The 'Translate Document' button automatically translates the entire document.
localization.alert: If you click on the text of a string, a suggestion for its translation will appear!
